attributes.action: require the immediate resignation of any MP who is implicated in the expenses scandal, so that the electorate can voice their support or opposition in a by-election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am appalled that MPs of all parties who resign their posts or lose the party whip, can nonetheless stay on until the next election, claiming a salary, receiving a huge pay-off and a massive pension at public expense.

rejection.details: Government does not control who sits in Parliament. This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament: http://www.parliament.uk/ or the relevant political party(ies).
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
